help.text: Guidance: a sealed pit has walls and floor which have been plastered to make it impermeable, for example with cement, so no content can seep out of the pit.

option.value: Yes, water can go in and out (not water tight)
option.text: Yes, water can go in and out (not water tight)

option.value: No, the pit is water tight
option.text: No, the pit is water tight

help.text: Guidance: this question is to confirm whether the pit is located in an area with high ground water table, as also noted down in question HH8.

help.text: Guidance: what signs show that the toilet is being used as a toilet? Not locked, not extremely dry, presence of water in the toilet, no spider webs in the pan or across the toilet, a person can reasonably enter the toilet, there is a path leading to the toilet (the area around the toilet is not overgrown),…

question.text: USAN1. Ask and observe question: IS THE TOILET IN USE AS A TOILET?

question.altText: के चर्पी प्राबिधिक रुपमा सहि ढंग ले संचालित भइरहेको छ?

help.text: The question is whether the toilet is functioning as intended by the technology, not whether the respondent thinks it is fine as it is used now.

question.text: USAN2. Ask and observe question: IS THE TOILET FUNCTIONING AS INTENDED?

question.altText: चर्पीमा ढोका र पर्खालहरु छन कि छैनन ?

help.text: With “in place” it is meant that the walls are standing, and the door can open and close. If the household doesn’t use any doors at all, it could also be another type of closure, e.g. curtain, screen,… The super structure should be in place.

option.text: Water is not available at this moment

question.text: HW8. Ask and observe question: IS THERE WATER AVAILABLE AT THE PLACE FOR HAND WASHING NEAR THE KITCHEN?

question.altText: अन्तर्वार्ता लिएको बेला भान्सा कोठा को नजिकै हात धुने स्थानमा साबुन वा साबुनको सट्टा प्रयोग गर्न सकिने सामाग्री उप्लब्ध छ ?
अवलोकन गर्नुहोस र सोध्नुहोस: अन्तर्वार्ता लिएको बेला भान्सा कोठाको नजिकै हात धुने स्थानमा साबुन वा साबुनको सट्टा प्रयोग गर्न सकिने सामाग्री उप्लब्ध छ ?

help.text: Note that this is a SPOT CHECK, so the soap or soap substitute has to be observed. At this moment means at the time of the interview.
help.altText: अवलोकन गर्नुहोस, साबुन हात धुने ठाउँ मा नभएर घरमा कतै छ र उत्तरदाता ले देखाउन सक्नु भएमा 'छ' मा चिन्ह लगाउनुहोस

question.text: HW9. Ask and observe question: IS THERE SOAP OR A SOAP SUBSTITUTE AVAILABLE AT THE PLACE FOR HAND WASHING NEAR THE KITCHEN?

question.altText: के हात धुने स्थान, हात बाट हुने पानीको प्रदुषण बाट मुक्त छ ?
अवलोकन गर्नुहोस र सोध्नुहोस: के हात धुने स्थान, हातबाट हुने पानीको प्रदुषणबाट मुक्त छ ?

dependency.answer-value: Soap at this moment|Ash at this moment|Mud / sand at this moment

help.text: Guidance: Only water from a tap or flowing device such as for example a tippy-tap (connected to running water or container with a lid) prevents contamination of water by hands.
help.altText: धारा वा धारा भएको भाडा बाट बगिरहेको पानी भएमा मात्रै पानी प्रदुषण बाट मुक्त हुन्छ

question.text: HW10. Ask and observe question: DOES THE HAND WASHING STATION PREVENT CONTAMINATION OF THE WATER BY HANDS?

question.altText: के धाराबाट बग्ने पानी आउछ?
अवलोकन गर्नुहोस र सोध्नुहोस: के धाराबाट बग्ने पानी आउछ?

dependency.answer-value: Water is available at this moment

question.text: HW11. Ask and observe question: IS THERE RUNNING WATER FROM A TAP?

question.altText: गत सुख्खायाममा (चैत्र, बैशाखमा) पिउन, खाना पकाउन, सरसफाई गर्न दिशा धुन/ फ्लस गर्न पर्याप्त पानी उपलब्घ थियो?

help.text: Note: Basic hygiene does NOT include bathing and laundry

question.text: WS1A. Please think about the amount of water (regardless of where it came from) that was available for the needs of you and your household during the months of the last dry season. Do you feel that during the last dry season months you had enough water for ALL of the following: drinking, cooking, cleaning (both house and toilet), AND basic hygiene (eg. washing hands, using the toilet)

question.altText: गत सुख्खायाममा (चैत्र, बैशाखमा) नुहाउन र कपडा धुन पर्याप्त पानी उपलब्ध थियो?

help.text: Note: the location of bathing and doing laundry does not matter. It can be at a stream, pond, well, handpump, public tap or at home. The question should only find out if people felt they had enough water available at that location for doing bathing and laundry.
help.altText: नोट: नुहाउन र कपडा कुन स्थानमा धुन्छ भन्ने कुरा मुल्य राख्दैन । प्रश्नले केवल प्रयोगकर्ताहरुलाई नुहाउन र कपडा धुन सो स्थानमा पर्याप्त पानी उपलब्ध हुने गर्थ्यो भन्ने लाग्छ भन्ने कुरा मात्र सोध्न खोजेको हो ।

question.text: WS1B. Do you feel that during the last dry season months you had enough water for BOTH bathing AND laundry (regardless of whether it was performed at the household or at the water supply)?

question.altText: गत सुख्खायाममा (चैत्र, बैशाखमा) बगैंचा र/वा पशुपालनको लागि पर्याप्त मात्रामा पानी उपलब्ध थियो?

help.text: Note: select yes if water was found enough for any (kitchen) gardening needs, OR watering of livestock. If they didn’t do either of the two activities, select not applicable.
help.altText: नोट: यदी कुनै करेसा बारी वा पशुपालनको लागी पर्याप्त पानी उपलब्ध छ भने Yes छनोट गर्नुहोस् । यदी करेसा बारी वा पशुपालन कुनै पनि गर्दैनन भने Not applicable छनोट गर्नुहोस् ।

question.text: WS1C. Do you feel that during the last dry season months you had enough water for household gardening and/or livestock?

question.altText: गत वर्षायाममा पिउन, खाना पकाउन, सरसफाई गर्न दिशा धुन/ फ्लस गर्न पर्याप्त पानी उपलब्घ थियो?

help.text: Note: Basic hygiene does NOT include bathing and laundry
help.altText: नोट: नुहाउन र कपडा धुन बाहेक अरु ।

question.text: WS2A. Please think about the amount of water that was available for the needs of you and your household during the months of the last wet season. Do you feel that during the last wet season months you had enough water for all the following: drinking, cooking, cleaning (both house and toilet), and basic hygiene (eg. washing hands, using the toilet)

question.altText: गत वर्षायाममा नुहाउन र कपडा धुन पर्याप्त पानी उपलब्ध थियो?

help.text: Note: the location of bathing and doing laundry does not matter. It can be at a stream, pond, well, handpump, public tap or at home. The question should only find out if people felt they had enough water available at that location for doing bathing and laundry.
help.altText: नोट: नुहाउन र कपडा कुन स्थानमा धुन्छ भन्ने कुरा मुल्य राख्दैन । प्रश्नले केवल प्रयोगकर्ताहरुलाई नुहाउन र कपडा धुन सो स्थानमा पर्याप्त पानी उपलब्ध हुने गर्थ्यो भन्ने लाग्छ भन्ने कुरा मात्र सोध्न खोजेको हो।

question.text: WS2B. Do you feel that during the last wet season months you had enough water for BOTH: bathing and laundry (regardless of whether it is performed at the household or at the water supply)?

question.altText: गत वर्षायाममा बगैंचा र/वा पशुपालनको लागि पर्याप्त मात्रामा पानी उपलब्ध थियो?
question.text: WS2C. Do you feel that during the last wet season months you had enough water for household gardening and/or livestock?

question.altText: सुख्खायाममा तपाईको घरमा पिउनको लागि मुख्यतया कस्तो पानी प्रयोग गर्नुहुन्छ?

help.text: Note: The water supply should be considered and defined based on where the household water collector/user actually goes to get the water. If they themselves go to a tap to get the water, then the supply is the gravity piped network. If they go to the river, then the supply is surface water.
help.altText: नोट: पानीको आपुर्ति भन्नाले घरको पानी संकलन गर्ने ब्यक्ती /प्रयोगकर्ता आफै पानी लिन कहाँ जान्छ भन्ने भुजाउछ ।यदी उनीहरु आफै पानी लिन धारामा जान्छन् भने पानीको आपुर्ति पाईप- गुरुत्वाकर्सन हुन्छ यदी खोलामा जन्छन् भने पानीको आपुर्ति सतहको पानी हुन्छ।

option.value: Tube well or borehole (public or private)
option.text: Tube well or borehole (public or private)

option.value: Surface water (river/ dam/ lake/ pond/ stream/ canal/ irrigation channel)
option.text: Surface water (river/ dam/ lake/ pond/ stream/ canal/ irrigation channel)
option.altText: सतहको पानी ( खोला/ बांध/ ताल /पोखरी /सानो नदि/ नहर/ सिचाई)

question.text: WS3A. Now we will talk about the water supplies that your household uses specifically for drinking. What type of water supply does your household use most for drinking during the dry season months?

question.altText: सुख्खायाममा तपाईको घरमा पिउनको लागि अरु पानी श्रोत प्रयोग गर्नुहुन्छ? (आपतविपतको बेलामा प्रयोग गरिने श्रोत नराख्ने)

dependency.answer-value: Piped - gravity|Piped – pumped/ overhead|Tube well or borehole (public or private)|Protected well|Unprotected well|Protected spring (including stone spout)|Unprotected spring|Rainwater|Tanker truck|Cart with small tank|Surface water (river/ dam/ lake/ pond/ stream/ canal/ irrigation channel)|Bottled water

help.text: This question aims at understanding if the household fulfils its drinking water needs from another source periodically, e.g. a household mostly uses hand pump but sometimes also uses bottled water. This should not count during emergency such as unexpected breakdown or natural disaster.
help.altText: नोट: पिउनको लागी समय समयमा अरु पनि पानीको श्रोत प्रयोग गर्छन, जस्तै घरमा धेरै जस्तो ह्यान्ड पम्प प्रयोग गर्छन तर कहिले काही बोतलको पानी पनि प्रयोग गर्छन । आकस्मिक अवधि जस्तै प्राकृतिक प्रकोप अथवा कहिले काही हुने घटनालाई समावेस गर्दैनौ ।

help.text: Note: A breakdown happens unexpectedly or causes an interruption in regularity of supply. It can be for example due to a breakdown in the pipeline, a blockage in water source, or interruption in water supply because of maintenance needs that prevents water from being supplied during normal supply hours. If a system requires regular pumping, an interruption is considered if that regular timing is not able to be followed.
help.altText: नोट: जस्तै पाईप बिग्रीएर, पाईप जाम भएर अथवा पानी आपुर्तिमा अवरोध भयो जसले गर्दा नियमित पानी आउन सकेन । यदी पम्पद्वारा पानी संकलन गरीन्छ र नियमित तालिका अनुसार गर्न सकेन भने बाधा बुजिन्छ ।

help.text: Note: A breakdown happens unexpectedly or causes an interruption in regularity of supply. It can be for example due to a breakdown in the pipeline, a blockage in water source, or interruption in water supply because of maintenance needs that prevents water from being supplied during normal supply hours. If a system requires regular pumping, an interruption is considered if that regular timing is not able to be followed.
help.altText: नोट: जस्तै पाईप बिग्रीएर, पाईप जाम भएर अथवा पानी आपुर्तिमा अवरोध भयो जसले गर्दा नियमित पानी आउन सकेन । यदी पम्पद्वारा पानी संकलन गरीन्छ र नियमित तालिका अनुसार गर्न सकेन भने बाधा बुजिन्छ ।

help.text: Note: A breakdown happens unexpectedly or causes an interruption in regularity of supply. It can be for example due to a breakdown in the pipeline, a blockage in water source, or interruption in water supply because of maintenance needs that prevents water from being supplied during normal supply hours. If a system requires regular pumping, an interruption is considered if that regular timing is not able to be followed.
help.altText: नोट: जस्तै पाईप बिग्रीएर, पाईप जाम भएर अथवा पानी आपुर्तिमा अवरोध भयो जसले गर्दा नियमित पानी आउन सकेन । यदी पम्पद्वारा पानी संकलन गरीन्छ र नियमित तालिका अनुसार गर्न सकेन भने बाधा बुजिन्छ ।

question.text: WS8E. Now we will discuss any times when the water was unexpectedly not available to be collected from this place? We can refer to such an event as a breakdown or interruption in service. Has your household experienced any such breakdown event in the past 1-month ?

question.text: DW1A. Please pretend that you are thirsty for a drink of water right now. Please go ahead and do what you would normally do to find and take a drink.
